title: Ngai rawh Lalpain a grep huanah
lyrics:
Ngai rawh, Lalpain a grep huanah,
Rah seng turin min ko;
Lo buh sengtute an tlem vangin,
Buhte an ngui zo ta.

Lalpa hmingin lawmin kal chhuak la,
Ngilnei leh zaidamin;
Chhandamna thlawnpek lawmawm tak chu,
Khawvela puang turin.

Kal la, boralte chu chhandam rawh,
Sual leh thim hnuai ata;
I kut thahruiin anni hruai la,
Thlemtu phuar chu phelh rawh.

Retheite chu hlim leh lawm takin,
Hmangaihna ruai thehan;
Lalpa, chatuan nunna chang turin,
Anni chu rawn hruai rawh.

Thawk thaui la, nite an kiam mek e,
An eng a reh thuai ang;
Hun khirh tak chu a lo thleng mek e,
Kan
thawk thei tawh lo vang.
